steps.description: Beginning, lope straight up the left side of the arena, circle the top end of the arena, and staying at least twenty feet from the walls or fence, run straight down the opposite or right side of the arena past the center marker and do a left rollback—no hesitation.

primitives.description: Beginning, lope straight up the left side of the arena.
Circle the top end of the arena, staying at least twenty feet from the walls or fence.
Run straight down the opposite or right side of the arena past the center marker.
Do a sliding stop.
Complete a half spin to the left with no hesitation.

steps.description: Continue straight up the right side of the arena circle back around the top of the arena, and staying at least twenty feet from the walls or fence, run straight down the left side of the arena past the center marker and do a right rollback—no hesitation.

primitives.description: Continue straight up the right side of the arena.
Circle back around the top of the arena, staying at least twenty feet from the walls or fence.
Run straight down the left side of the arena past the center marker.
Do a sliding stop.
Complete a half spin to the right with no hesitation.

steps.description: Continue up the left side of the arena to the center marker. At the center marker, the horse should be on the right lead. Guide the horse to the center of the arena on the right lead and complete three circles to the right: the first two circles large and fast; the third circle small and slow. Change leads at the center of the arena.

primitives.description: Continue up the left side of the arena to the center marker.
Guide the horse to the center of the arena on the right lead and complete a large fast circle to the right.
Complete a large fast circle to the right.
Complete a small slow circle to the right.
Change leads at the center of the arena.

steps.description: Complete three circles to the left: the first two circles large and fast; the third circle small and slow. Change leads in the center of the arena.

primitives.description: Complete a large fast circle to the left.
Complete a large fast circle to the left.
Complete a small slow circle to the left.
Change leads in the center of the arena.

steps.description: Begin a large circle to the right but do not close this circle. Continue up the left side of the arena, circle the top of the arena, and staying at least twenty feet from the walls or fence, run straight down the opposite or right side of the arena past the center marker and do a sliding stop. Back up at least ten feet. Hesitate.

primitives.description: Begin a large circle to the right but do not close this circle.
Continue up the left side of the arena.
Circle the top of the arena, staying at least twenty feet from the walls or fence.
Run straight down the opposite or right side of the arena past the center marker.
Do a sliding stop.
Back up at least ten feet.
Hesitate.

steps.description: Complete four spins to the right. Hesitate.

primitives.description: Complete four spins to the right.
Hesitate.

steps.description: Complete four spins to the left. Hesitate to demonstrate completion of the pattern.

primitives.description: Complete four spins to the left.
Hesitate to demonstrate completion of the pattern.
